snippet: Kipkoech Ruto won the Anthem Richmond Marathon in Virginia with a time of 2 hours 15 minutes 13 seconds to lead a sweep of the top three places by Kenyans.
lead_paragraph: Kipkoech Ruto won the Anthem Richmond Marathon in Virginia with a time of 2 hours 15 minutes 13 seconds to lead a sweep of the top three places by Kenyans.

headline.seo: Kenyan Men Sweep Anthem Richmond Marathon
headline.main: Kenyan Men Sweep Anthem Richmond Marathon
